name: Protect The Planet Mars (Русская версия)
description:
The goal of the game is to protect the planet Mars. You are a brave spaceship pilot. Enemy ships are flying to the planet Mars. You need to rotate around Mars and attack them. During the game you can collect bonuses that will improve your weapons.

They say that you can only hold out for 3 minutes. Is it true?

The game is best played in fullscreen mode.

Controls:

The game is controlled using the mouse and keyboard A / D or a virtual joystick on the screen.

Attribution:

Feedback and bug reports will be most welcome!
